title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat the eggs and mix with grated cheese.
Drain the pasta and mix with pancetta and egg mixture.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.
